price: 29. Mano Žodžiai negali būti pakeisti, ir Aš nesu neteisingas Savo vergams.
arabic: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: mā yubaddalu al-qawlu ladayya wamā anā biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
